sns_toolbox.simulate.simulate_utilities¶

Various Utility functions used when creating/simulating the various backends.

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

send_vars(variables, device)

Send a set of variables to a specific device. Used with PyTorch backends.

spike_raster_plot(t, data, colors=None) → None

Plot spike rasters of spiking data.
sns_toolbox.simulate.simulate_utilities.send_vars(variables, device)¶

Send a set of variables to a specific device. Used with PyTorch backends.

Parameters:

  • variables (List of torch.tensors) – Variables to send.

  • device (torch.device) – Device to send the variables to.

Returns:

Variables sent to correct device.

Return type:

List of torch.tensors

sns_toolbox.simulate.simulate_utilities.spike_raster_plot(t, data, colors=None) → None¶

Plot spike rasters of spiking data.

Parameters:

  • t (List, np.ndarray, or torch.tensor) – vector of timesteps.

  • data (np.ndarray or torch.tensor) – 2D vector of spiking data. Each row corresponds to a different neuron.

  • colors (List of str, optional) – List of colors to plot each neuron, default is every neuron is blue.

Returns:

None

Return type:

N/A
